data.name: World of Guns:Starter Pack
data.detailed_description:
World of Guns:Starter Pack unlocks 15 models from different categories and 1 Shooting Range.

Categories and models which are included in Starter Pack
Assault Rifles: FN FAL, M16A1
Pistols: Desert Eagle, CZ-75, SIG P228
Shotgun: Remington 870
Revolver: S&W Model 53
Machinegun: Browning M1919A4
Rifle: SIG SG550S
SMG: Ingram Mac-10
WWII: DP-27 machingun, Boys Anti-Tank rifle
Sport: Ruger MKII
Historical:Lewis Machingun
Compact: COP pistol

Shooting Range for Colt M1911 A1 is included.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: XP and higher
  • Memory: 1024 MB RAM
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: XP and higher
  • Memory: 1024 MB RAM
  • Storage: 500 MB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:

  • Memory: 1024 MB RAM
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:

  • Memory: 1024 MB RAM
  • Storage: 500 MB available space

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu Linux, version 10.10 or later
  • Memory: 1024 MB RAM
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:

  • Memory: 1024 MB RAM
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
